trans-unit.source: Converting WDCML to Markdown for Open Publishing
trans-unit.target: Converting WDCML to Markdown for Open Publishing

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to convert WDCML to Markdown that validates and renders correctly in the MSDN Open Publishing environment.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to convert WDCML to Markdown that validates and renders correctly in the MSDN Open Publishing environment.

trans-unit.source: First, install Pandoc and use cbx msdn markdown to build your project into .md files.
trans-unit.target: First, install Pandoc and use cbx msdn markdown to build your project into .md files.

trans-unit.source: Then, use these steps to modify the resulting .md files so that they pass OP validation.
trans-unit.target: Then, use these steps to modify the resulting .md files so that they pass OP validation.

trans-unit.source: Fix links as follows:
trans-unit.target: Fix links as follows:

trans-unit.source: Replace .htm link suffixes with .md, for in-project targets, for example:
trans-unit.target: Replace .htm link suffixes with .md, for in-project targets, for example:

trans-unit.source: [Creating a Driver From Existing Source Files](creating_a_driver_from_existing_source_files.htm).
trans-unit.target: [Creating a Driver From Existing Source Files](creating_a_driver_from_existing_source_files.htm).

trans-unit.source: Replace A keywords with URLs, for example:
trans-unit.target: Replace A keywords with URLs, for example:

trans-unit.source: [Kernel-Mode Driver Framework](kmdf.portal)
trans-unit.target: [Kernel-Mode Driver Framework](kmdf.portal)

trans-unit.source: mofcomp
trans-unit.target: mofcomp

trans-unit.source: Switch references to upper case Images directory to images: ![Visual Studio Solution Explorer Driver Package Project](images/VsSlnExplorer.png)
trans-unit.target: Switch references to upper case Images directory to images: ![Visual Studio Solution Explorer Driver Package Project](images/VsSlnExplorer.png)

trans-unit.source: Remove %20: [MSBuild](%20http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=262804)
trans-unit.target: Remove %20: [MSBuild](%20http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=262804)

trans-unit.source: Add common/wedge.gif.
trans-unit.target: Add common/wedge.gif.

trans-unit.source: Place the common directory as a child of your main docset directory.
trans-unit.target: Place the common directory as a child of your main docset directory.

trans-unit.source: In the Markdown files, change references to ![](../common/wedge.gif) to ![](common/wedge.gif).
trans-unit.target: In the Markdown files, change references to ![](../common/wedge.gif) to ![](common/wedge.gif).

trans-unit.source: In the OP environment, you cannot use relative references that go above the docset directory.
trans-unit.target: In the OP environment, you cannot use relative references that go above the docset directory.

trans-unit.source: If See Also links are concatenated, prepend asterisks to create bullet list.
trans-unit.target: If See Also links are concatenated, prepend asterisks to create bullet list.

trans-unit.source: Create TOC.md in parent directory.
trans-unit.target: Create TOC.md in parent directory.

trans-unit.source: Delete second occurrence of local target string: [Manually installing WDTF on a test computer](dtf.runtime_library#manual_install_wdtf#manual_install_wdtf)
trans-unit.target: Delete second occurrence of local target string: [Manually installing WDTF on a test computer](dtf.runtime_library#manual_install_wdtf#manual_install_wdtf)

trans-unit.source: Update embedded video links from: ![]()
trans-unit.target: Update embedded video links from: ![]()

trans-unit.source: to look like this:
trans-unit.target: to look like this:

trans-unit.source: Remove initial span so that OP creates correct topic title for text on browser tab:
trans-unit.target: Remove initial span so that OP creates correct topic title for text on browser tab:

trans-unit.source: Remove nested parentheses from links: [InfVerif](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn929319(v=vs.85).aspx)
trans-unit.target: Remove nested parentheses from links: [InfVerif](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn929319(v=vs.85).aspx)

trans-unit.source: For mailto links, replace nested parentheses with %28, %29: [Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20Analyzing%20a%20Driver%20Using%20Code%20Analysis%20and%20Verification%20Tools%20%20RELEASE:%20(9/30/2015)&body=... Topics that contain parentheses in the topic title also cause additional parentheses in the mailto link: [Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20What%20happens%20when%20you%20provision%20a%20computer%20(WDK%208.0)%20%20RELEASE:%20%289/30/2015%29
trans-unit.target: For mailto links, replace nested parentheses with %28, %29: [Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20Analyzing%20a%20Driver%20Using%20Code%20Analysis%20and%20Verification%20Tools%20%20RELEASE:%20(9/30/2015)&body=... Topics that contain parentheses in the topic title also cause additional parentheses in the mailto link: [Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20What%20happens%20when%20you%20provision%20a%20computer%20(WDK%208.0)%20%20RELEASE:%20%289/30/2015%29

trans-unit.source: Remove extra whitespace that occurs after a Note inside a numbered list item, because it causes OP to start numbering again from 1.
trans-unit.target: Remove extra whitespace that occurs after a Note inside a numbered list item, because it causes OP to start numbering again from 1.

trans-unit.source: Leave one blank line remaining.
trans-unit.target: Leave one blank line remaining.

trans-unit.source: Remove copyright line: `© 2015 Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Remove copyright line: `© 2015 Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: All rights reserved.`
trans-unit.target: All rights reserved.`

trans-unit.source: Copyright is handled at site level.
trans-unit.target: Copyright is handled at site level.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that image file suffixes are lower case, i.e. not PNG.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that image file suffixes are lower case, i.e. not PNG.

trans-unit.source: If alignment is incorrect, add a line break after image references.
trans-unit.target: If alignment is incorrect, add a line break after image references.

trans-unit.source: Snippet type input converts to <html></html>, but snippet type code converts to a table, which gets padded with extra whitespace. TBD: why are regular tables not padded similarly?
trans-unit.target: Snippet type input converts to <html></html>, but snippet type code converts to a table, which gets padded with extra whitespace. TBD: why are regular tables not padded similarly?
